success_criteria: Linter (ESLint) passes with zero errors; Code formatter (Prettier) passes.
business_impact: Ensures consistent code style and prevents trivial bugs.

success_criteria: Code builds successfully; Unit test coverage > 80% (REQ-1-064); All unit tests pass; SAST scan finds no new critical/high vulnerabilities (REQ-1-078); SCA scan finds no new critical/high vulnerabilities (REQ-1-078).
failure_action: Block PR merge; Post failure status to GitHub.
escalation_procedure: PR author and reviewers are notified automatically.
business_impact: Prevents broken code and known vulnerabilities from entering the main branch.

success_criteria: Deployment to Staging successful; All integration tests pass; All critical-path E2E smoke tests pass; Container image scan finds no new critical/high vulnerabilities (REQ-1-078).
failure_action: Alert on-call developer; Prevent promotion to Production; Potentially trigger automated rollback.
business_impact: Catches integration and regression bugs before they reach production.

success_criteria: Full E2E regression suite passes; Automated load tests meet all performance NFRs (REQ-1-053); Manual UAT by Product Owner is signed off; No P0/P1 bugs are open for the release.
business_impact: Final quality check to ensure release readiness and prevent production incidents.
